title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When saving a file using the Save As feature, the file type is not remembered and the icon changes to a generic file icon.
EB: The file is now saved as a generic file, and when opening it, it is treated as a plain text file. The expected behavior is for the file to be saved with the same extension as the original file, unless explicitly changed.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Open a file.
3. Click on File menu.
4. Select Save As.
5. Choose a new location and filename.
6. Click Save.
7. Close the file.
8. Reopen the saved file.
